metadata.name: SQL Managed Instance Database Backup Short-Term Retention Policies
metadata.description: This module deploys a SQL Managed Instance Database Backup Short-Term Retention Policy.
Required. The name of the Short Term Retention backup policy. For example "default".
Conditional. The name of the parent SQL managed instance database. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Conditional. The name of the parent SQL managed instance. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. The backup retention period in days. This is how many days Point-in-Time Restore will be supported.
The name of the deployed database backup short-term retention policy.
The resource ID of the deployed database backup short-term retention policy.
The resource group of the deployed database backup short-term retention policy.
